laws.notes: Foreign Exchange and Foreign Trade Act regulates dual-use technology exports

laws.name: KR-Strategic-Tech
laws.notes: Strategic Technology Protection Act controls semiconductor exports

laws.name: EU-Conflict-Minerals
laws.notes: EU Conflict Minerals Regulation for 3TG minerals

laws.name: EU-Battery-Reg

laws.name: IN-Environmental-Protection
laws.notes: Environment Protection Act mining and industrial emission standards

laws.name: AU-Critical-Minerals
laws.notes: Critical Minerals Strategy regulates exports of strategic resources

laws.notes: DRC Mining Code requires transparency and community benefit

laws.name: ID-Mining-Regulation
laws.notes: Indonesian Mining Law regulates mineral processing and export

laws.name: ID-Deforestation-Act

laws.notes: Brazilian Environmental Code for industrial emissions and land use

laws.notes: Saudi petrochemical safety and export regulations

laws.name: ZA-Mineral-Resources-Act
laws.notes: Mineral and Petroleum Resources Development Act

laws.name: TR-Environmental-Law
laws.notes: Turkish Environmental Law emission standards

laws.name: UK-Environmental-Act
laws.notes: UK Environment Act industrial emissions framework

laws.name: CA-Environmental-Protection
laws.notes: Canadian Environmental Protection Act for mining and smelting

laws.name: EU-CBAM-Poland
laws.notes: EU CBAM applies to Polish copper and steel exports

laws.name: EG-Mining-Law
laws.notes: Egyptian mining and industrial regulation

laws.name: BD-Labor-Compliance

laws.name: PH-Mining-Act

trade_agreements.name: USMCA
trade_agreements.benefit: Tariff elimination on qualifying goods between members, reduced customs processing time

trade_agreements.name: CPTPP
trade_agreements.benefit: Comprehensive tariff reduction up to 95% of goods, streamlined customs procedures

trade_agreements.name: RCEP
trade_agreements.benefit: Harmonized rules of origin, reduced tariffs on industrial goods across Asia-Pacific

trade_agreements.name: EU-Single-Market
trade_agreements.benefit: Free movement of goods within EU/EEA, single customs territory, no internal tariffs

trade_agreements.name: EU-Japan-EPA
trade_agreements.benefit: Elimination of tariffs on 97% of goods, mutual recognition of standards

trade_agreements.name: KORUS-FTA
trade_agreements.benefit: Tariff elimination on 95% of goods, expedited customs clearance

trade_agreements.name: China-ASEAN-FTA
trade_agreements.benefit: Zero tariffs on 90% of traded goods, simplified certificates of origin

trade_agreements.name: MERCOSUR
trade_agreements.benefit: Common external tariff, preferential trade within South American common market

trade_agreements.name: US-Australia-FTA
trade_agreements.benefit: Tariff elimination on nearly all goods, investment protections

trade_agreements.name: UK-Japan-CEPA
trade_agreements.benefit: Maintained EU-Japan EPA benefits post-Brexit, digital trade provisions

risk_events.description: Health emergency lockdown restrictions on port operations
ILWU labor action causing partial port shutdown
Red Sea security threat from Houthi missile attacks on commercial vessels
Post-holiday volume surge causing 3-5 day berthing delays
Monsoon season causing minor vessel diversions
Bosphorus strait closure due to vessel grounding
Typhoon season diversions causing terminal backlog
Geopolitical tensions increasing insurance premiums and rerouting
Canal congestion risk from vessel queue exceeding 72 hours
